title: Will Russia Invade Ukraine?
sub_head: The latest on deterring Vladimir Putin’s potential military attack.
body: Vladimir Putin has deployed his military on Ukraine’s northern, southern and eastern borders. The U.S. fears these aggressive moves are the precursor to an attack on the democracy. Meanwhile, Ukraine also fears Russia will try to destabilize its government, conduct cyberattacks on critical infrastructure, or use other forms of hybrid warfare against it. The Wall Street Journal editorial page is on the ground to report on one of the most tense moments in Europe since the collapse of the Soviet Union.
